20110105190634.000|20110105190636.000|CC1|CONGRESS.                       
20110105190636.000|20110105190638.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE OF OHIO'S 8TH        
20110105190638.000|20110105190639.000|CC1|CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICT          
20110105190639.000|20110105190640.000|CC1|CONTINUED TO AFFORD ME THE      
20110105190640.000|20110105190641.000|CC1|PRIVILEGE TO SERVE FOR WHICH    
20110105190641.000|20110105190644.000|CC1|I AM DEEPLY GRATEFUL.           
20110105190644.000|20110105190646.000|CC1|WE HAVE HERE TODAY IN A TIME    
20110105190646.000|20110105190648.000|CC1|OF GREAT CHALLENGES.            
20110105190648.000|20110105190650.000|CC1|AND ONE IN TEN OF OUR           
20110105190650.000|20110105190651.000|CC1|NEIGHBORS IS OUT OF WORK.       
20110105190651.000|20110105190652.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE COSTS ARE STILL     
20110105190652.000|20110105190654.000|CC1|RISING FOR AMERICAN             
20110105190654.000|20110105190655.000|CC1|FAMILIES.                       
20110105190655.000|20110105190656.000|CC1|OUR SPENDING HAS CAUGHT UP      
20110105190656.000|20110105190658.000|CC1|WITH US AND OUR DEBT SOON       
20110105190658.000|20110105190700.000|CC1|WILL BE ECLIPSED THE ENTIRE     
20110105190700.000|20110105190702.000|CC1|SIZE OF OUR NATIONAL COON       
20110105190702.000|20110105190703.000|CC1|ME.                             
20110105190703.000|20110105190704.000|CC1|HARD WORK AND TOUGH             
20110105190704.000|20110105190705.000|CC1|DECISIONS WILL BE REQUIRED      
20110105190705.000|20110105190709.000|CC1|OF THE 1 12TH CONGRESS.         
20110105190709.000|20110105190712.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE FALL SHORT.    
20110105190712.000|20110105190714.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE KICK THE       
20110105190714.000|20110105190717.000|CC1|CAN DOWN THE ROAD.              
20110105190717.000|20110105190720.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE VOTED TO END         
20110105190720.000|20110105190721.000|CC1|BUSINESS AS USUAL AND TODAY     
20110105190721.000|20110105190724.000|CC1|WE BEGIN TO CARRY OUT THEIR     
20110105190724.000|20110105190725.000|CC1|INSTRUCTIONS.                   
20110105190725.000|20110105190743.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110105190743.000|20110105190745.000|CC1|>> IN THE CATHOLIC FAITH WE     
20110105190745.000|20110105190750.000|CC1|ENTER HAVING ASHES MARKED ON    
20110105190750.000|20110105190825.000|CC1|OUR HEAD                        
20110105190825.000|20110105190827.000|CC1|THAT INCLUDES THE GAVEL         
20110105190827.000|20110105190831.000|CC1|WHICH A I ACCEPT GREATFULLY     
20110105190831.000|20110105190833.000|CC1|KNOWING THAT I AM ITS           
20110105190833.000|20110105190834.000|CC1|CARETAKER, AFTERALL THIS IS     
20110105190835.000|20110105190835.000|XDS|%    TITLE:   
20110105190834.000|20110105190841.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE'S HOUSE.             
20110105190841.000|20110105190847.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110105190847.000|20110105190849.000|CC1|THIS IS THEIR CONGRESS.         
20110105190849.000|20110105190851.000|CC1|IT IS ABOUT THEM, NOT ABOUT     
20110105190851.000|20110105190853.000|CC1|US.                             
20110105190853.000|20110105190854.000|CC1|WHAT THEY WANT IS A             
20110105190854.000|20110105190856.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT THAT IS HONEST,      
20110105190856.000|20110105190857.000|CC1|ACCOUNTABLE AND RESPONSIVE      
20110105190857.000|20110105190858.000|CC1|TO THEIR NEEDS.                 
20110105190858.000|20110105190900.000|CC1|A GOVERNMENT THAT RESPECTS      
20110105190900.000|20110105190902.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL LIBERTY.             
20110105190902.000|20110105190904.000|CC1|HONORS OUR HERITAGE AND VOWS    
20110105190904.000|20110105190905.000|CC1|BEFORE THE PUBLIC THAT IT       
20110105190905.000|20110105190907.000|CC1|SERVES.                         
20110105190907.000|20110105190908.000|CC1|LET'S START WITH THE RULES      
20110105190908.000|20110105190909.000|CC1|PACKAGE THAT THE HOUSE WILL     
20110105190909.000|20110105190911.000|CC1|CONSIDER TODAY.                 
20110105190911.000|20110105190913.000|CC1|IF PASSED IT WILL CHANGE HOW    
20110105190913.000|20110105190916.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION OPERATES.      
20110105190916.000|20110105190917.000|CC1|WITH EMPHASIS ON                
20110105190917.000|20110105190918.000|CC1|TRANSPARENCY.                   
20110105190918.000|20110105190920.000|CC1|GREATER ACCOUNTABILITY AND      
20110105190920.000|20110105190922.000|CC1|THE RENEWED FOCUS OF OUR        
20110105190922.000|20110105190924.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION.                   
20110105190924.000|20110105190926.000|CC1|OUR AIM WILL BE TO GIVE THE     
20110105190926.000|20110105190926.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BACK TO THE          
20110105190926.000|20110105190929.000|CC1|AMERICAN PEOPLE.                
20110105190929.000|20110105190931.000|CC1|AND IN THIS GOAL, WE WILL       
20110105190931.000|20110105190932.000|CC1|PART WITH SOME OF THE           
20110105190932.000|20110105190933.000|CC1|RITUALS THAT HAVE COME TO       
20110105190933.000|20110105190934.000|CC1|CHARACTERIZE THIS               
20110105190934.000|20110105190936.000|CC1|INSTITUTION UNDER MAJORITIES    
20110105190936.000|20110105190938.000|CC1|BOTH REPUBLICAN AND DEMOCRAT    
20110105190938.000|20110105190940.000|CC1|ALIKE.                          
20110105190940.000|20110105190942.000|CC1|WE WILL DISPENSE WITH THE       
20110105190942.000|20110105190943.000|CC1|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM THAT        
20110105190943.000|20110105190944.000|CC1|BIGGER BILLS ARE ALWAYS         
20110105190944.000|20110105190947.000|CC1|BETTER.                         
20110105190947.000|20110105190949.000|CC1|FAST LEGISLATING IS GOOD        
20110105190949.000|20110105190949.000|CC1|LEGISLATING.                    
20110105190949.000|20110105190951.000|CC1|ALLOWING AMENDMENTS TO OPEN     
20110105190951.000|20110105190952.000|CC1|DEBATE.                         
20110105190952.000|20110105190955.000|CC1|MAKING THE LEGISLATIVE          
20110105190955.000|20110105190957.000|CC1|PROCESS LESS EFFICIENT THAN     
20110105190957.000|20110105191000.000|CC1|OUR FOREFATHERS INTENDED.       
20110105191000.000|20110105191002.000|CC1|THESE MISCONCEPTIONS ARE THE    
20110105191002.000|20110105191003.000|CC1|RITUALS OF A MODERN             
20110105191003.000|20110105191003.000|CC1|WASHINGTON.                     
20110105191003.000|20110105191004.000|CC1|THEY, IN MY OPINION, HAVE       
20110105191004.000|20110105191007.000|CC1|NOT BEEN SERVED WELL TO THE     
20110105191007.000|20110105191010.000|CC1|AMERICAN PEOPLE.                
20110105191010.000|20110105191011.000|CC1|TODAY MINDFUL OF THE LESSONS

20110105191013.000|20110105191014.000|CC1|NEW CHAPTER.                    
20110105191014.000|20110105191015.000|CC1|LEGISLATORS AND THE PUBLIC      
20110105191015.000|20110105191017.000|CC1|WILL HAVE THREE DAYS TO READ    
20110105191017.000|20110105191018.000|CC1|A BILL BEFORE IT COMES TO A     
20110105191018.000|20110105191019.000|CC1|VOTE.                           
20110105191019.000|20110105191020.000|CC1|LEGISLATION WILL BE MORE        
20110105191020.000|20110105191022.000|CC1|FOCUSED PROPERLY SCRUTINIZED    
20110105191022.000|20110105191025.000|CC1|AND CONSTITUTIONALLY SOUND.

20110105191030.000|20110105191033.000|CC1|MISSION INCLUDING OVERSIGHT.    
20110105191033.000|20110105191034.000|CC1|AND THEY HAVE MADE IT EASIER

20110105191037.000|20110105191038.000|CC1|REFORMS THAT MAKE IT EASIER     
20110105191038.000|20110105191040.000|CC1|TO CUT SPENDING.                
20110105191040.000|20110105191042.000|CC1|AND WE WILL START BY CUTTING    
20110105191042.000|20110105191044.000|CC1|CONGRESS' OWN BUDGET.

20110105191103.000|20110105191105.000|CC1|>> ABOVE ALL ELSE, WE WILL

20110105191129.000|20110105191130.000|CC1|THIS.

20110105191132.000|20110105191133.000|CC1|AMERICA.

20110105191135.000|20110105191135.000|CC1|LISTENING TO THE AMERICAN

20110105191137.000|20110105191138.000|CC1|WE WILL STAND FIRM.

20110105191157.000|20110105191200.000|CC1|MINORITY, I OFFER A             
20110105191200.000|20110105191200.000|CC1|COMMITMENT.                     
20110105191200.000|20110105191201.000|CC1|OPENNESS.                       
20110105191201.000|20110105191203.000|CC1|ONCE A TRADITION OF THIS

20110105191221.000|20110105191223.000|CC1|YOU WILL NOT HAVE THE RIGHT     
20110105191223.000|20110105191225.000|CC1|TO WILLFULLY DISRUPT THE        
20110105191225.000|20110105191226.000|CC1|PROCEEDINGS OF THE PEOPLE'S

20110105191229.000|20110105191231.000|CC1|THE OPEN PROCESS THAT WILL      
20110105191231.000|20110105191232.000|CC1|ALLOW TO YOU REPRESENT YOUR

20110105191250.000|20110105191252.000|CC1|IN TIME, I BELIEVE THIS         
20110105191252.000|20110105191255.000|CC1|FRAMEWORK WILL ALLOW THE

20110105191317.000|20110105191320.000|CC1|TODAY, I KNOW YOU DO SO         
20110105191320.000|20110105191323.000|CC1|MINDFUL OF THE SHARED GOAL.     
20110105191323.000|20110105191325.000|CC1|AND KNOW THAT YOUR              
20110105191325.000|20110105191326.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS HAVE PLACED        
20110105191326.000|20110105191328.000|CC1|MUCH TRUST IN YOU.              
20110105191328.000|20110105191330.000|CC1|AS SPEAKER, I FEEL APART OF     
20110105191330.000|20110105191331.000|CC1|MY JOB IS TO HELP EACH OF       
20110105191331.000|20110105191334.000|CC1|YOU TO DO YOUR JOB WELL         
20110105191334.000|20110105191335.000|CC1|REGARDLESS OF YOUR POLITICAL    
20110105191335.000|20110105191336.000|CC1|PARTY.                          
20110105191336.000|20110105191337.000|CC1|MY HOPE IS THAT EVERY NEW       
20110105191337.000|20110105191338.000|CC1|MEMBER AND INDEED EVERY         
20110105191338.000|20110105191341.000|CC1|MEMBER WILL BE COMFORTABLE      
20110105191341.000|20110105191342.000|CC1|WITH APPROACHING ME WITH        
20110105191342.000|20110105191343.000|CC1|REGARD TO MATTERS OF THE        
20110105191343.000|20110105191345.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105191345.000|20110105191346.000|CC1|WE WILL NOT ALWAYS GET IT       
20110105191346.000|20110105191348.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20110105191348.000|20110105191350.000|CC1|WE WILL NOT ALWAYS AGREE ON     
20110105191350.000|20110105191351.000|CC1|WHAT IS RIGHT.                  
20110105191351.000|20110105191353.000|CC1|THAT IS A GREAT DEAL OF SCAR    
20110105191353.000|20110105191355.000|CC1|TISSUE THAT HAS BUILT UP ON     
20110105191355.000|20110105191356.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES OF THE AISLE.        
20110105191356.000|20110105191358.000|CC1|WE CAN'T IGNORE THAT.           
20110105191358.000|20110105191400.000|CC1|NOR SHOULD WE.                  
20110105191400.000|20110105191402.000|CC1|MY BELIEF IS THAT WE CAN        
20110105191402.000|20110105191403.000|CC1|DISAGREE WITHOUT BEING          
20110105191403.000|20110105191404.000|CC1|DISAGREEABLE.                   
20110105191404.000|20110105191406.000|CC1|THAT IS WHY IT IS CRITICAL      
20110105191406.000|20110105191409.000|CC1|THAT INSTITUTION OPERATES IN    
20110105191409.000|20110105191411.000|CC1|A MANNER THAT PERMITS A FREE    
20110105191411.000|20110105191412.000|CC1|EXCHANGE OF IDEAS AND           
20110105191412.000|20110105191413.000|CC1|RESOLVES OUR DIFFERENCES        
20110105191413.000|20110105191415.000|CC1|THROUGH AFFAIR DEBATE AND       
20110105191415.000|20110105191417.000|CC1|VOTE.                           
20110105191417.000|20110105191419.000|CC1|WE MAY HAVE DIFFERENT           
20110105191419.000|20110105191420.000|CC1|SOMETIMES VERY DIFFERENT        
20110105191420.000|20110105191422.000|CC1|IDEAS ABOUT HOW TO GO ON        
20110105191422.000|20110105191424.000|CC1|ACHIEVING THE COMMON GOOD.      
20110105191424.000|20110105191427.000|CC1|IT IS WHY WE SERVE.             
20110105191427.000|20110105191430.000|CC1|LET US NOW MOVE FORWARD,        
20110105191430.000|20110105191432.000|CC1|HUMBLE IN OUR DEMEANOR.         
20110105191432.000|20110105191434.000|CC1|STUDY IN PRINCIPLES AND         
20110105191434.000|20110105191435.000|CC1|DEDICATED TO APPROVING          
20110105191435.000|20110105191437.000|CC1|WORTHY OF THE TRUST AND THE     
20110105191437.000|20110105191438.000|CC1|CONFIDENCE THAT WAS PLACED      
20110105191438.000|20110105191439.000|CC1|IN EACH OF US.                  
20110105191439.000|20110105191441.000|CC1|IF WE BRACE OURSELVES TO DO     
20110105191441.000|20110105191446.000|CC1|OUR DUTY, AND DO WHAT WE SAY    
20110105191446.000|20110105191448.000|CC1|WE ARE GOING TO DO, I DON'T     
20110105191448.000|20110105191451.000|CC1|THINK THERE'S TOGETHER          
20110105191451.000|20110105191452.000|CC1|ANYTHING THAT WE CAN'T          
20110105191452.000|20110105191453.000|CC1|ACCOMPLISH AGAIN ON BEHALF      
20110105191453.000|20110105191458.000|CC1|OF THE PEOPLE THAT WE SERVE.    
20110105191458.000|20110105191500.000|CC1|MORE THAN ACCOUNTRY, AMERICA    
20110105191500.000|20110105191502.000|CC1|IS AN IDEA.                     
20110105191502.000|20110105191506.000|CC1|IT IS OUR JOB TO PASS THAT'     
20110105191506.000|20110105191507.000|CC1|TERRITORY OF BLESSINGS THAT     
20110105191507.000|20110105191509.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN BESTOWED UPON US

20110105191512.000|20110105191513.000|CC1|FOLLOWING US.                   
20110105191513.000|20110105191514.000|CC1|I WANT TO WISH YOU ALL THE

20110105191537.000|20110105191541.000|CC1|JOHN BOEHNER, CONGRESS'S NEW    
20110105191541.000|20110105191542.000|CC1|HOUSE SPEAKER AS THE            
20110105191542.000|20110105191542.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN PARTY TAKES          
20110105191542.000|20110105191545.000|CC1|CONTROL OF THE HOUSE.           
20110105191545.000|20110105191547.000|CC1|SIBILA: FROM THIS POINT ON      
20110105191547.000|20110105191548.000|CC1|THEY ARE TAKING INSTRUCTION

20110105191550.000|20110105191552.000|CC1|AFTERALL, THIS IS THE           
20110105191552.000|20110105191555.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S HOUSE.                 
20110105191555.000|20110105191557.000|CC1|>> I AM NOW READY TO TAKE       
20110105191557.000|20110105191558.000|CC1|THE OATH OF OFFICE.
